options.C: To study the impact of exercise on cardiovascular health.
options.D: To analyze the role of genetics in cardiovascular diseases.
options.E: To evaluate the effectiveness of dietary supplements on heart health.

20.question: What was the main conclusion of the study regarding meal timing and CVD risk?

options.A: Meal timing has no impact on CVD risk.
